DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability.
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Oral Immunotherapy for Cow's Milk Allergy in School-aged Children
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criteria: Age 6 - 16 yrs - IgE-mediated milk allergy - and milk provocation within 3 months prior to or an documented accidental milk contact with clear immediate symptoms Outcome measures: - number of patients with successful desensitization (195 - 200 ml milk per day) - number of patients with adverse events
DOC.criteria: IgEmediated milk allergy An immediately positive challenge test result to milk prior to inclusion Not willing to participate
